1.Alert: System Alert: Ship Course has been altered. Manual readjustments required.

2.Alert: System Alert: Engine Power has been changed to low power. Manual readjustments required.

3.Alert: Alert: Data System issues have been detected.

4.Alert: Alert: Communications channel issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

5.Alert: Alert: Power system issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

6.Alert: Alert: Oxygen Level changes detected. Manual readjustments required.

7.Alert: Air Filtration System issues detected. Manual investigation required.
